#+TITLE: French Verb Drill: Physical Activity
#+AUTHOR: Generated by verbiste.el
#+STARTUP: overview

* Introduction

This drill focuses on verbs related to walking, movement, and physical actions.
Practice conjugating these verbs in different tenses and using them in sentences.

* Verbs in this group

1. castagner
2. marcher
3. déchausser
4. ânonner
5. béquiller
6. courir
7. sauter
8. nager
9. grimper
10. s'exercer

* Example Sentences

- Ils se castagnent dans la rue. (They fight in the street.)
- Nous marchons tous les jours. (We walk every day.)
- Le dentiste déchausse la dent. (The dentist loosens the tooth.)

* Conjugation Drills

** castagner

*** Present Tense

| Subject   | Conjugation |
|-----------+------------|
| je | |
| tu | |
| il/elle | |
| nous | |
| vous | |
| ils/elles | |

*** Future Tense

| Subject   | Conjugation |
|-----------+------------|
| je | |
| tu | |
| il/elle | |
| nous | |
| vous | |
| ils/elles | |

*** Passé Composé

| Subject   | Conjugation |
|-----------+------------|
| je | |
| tu | |
| il/elle | |
| nous | |
| vous | |
| ils/elles | |
